fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Gather the strength of the town to aid you. Select three players besides yourself and a fourth target. If all three of your original targets are members of the Town, deal an Unstoppable attack to your fourth target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kill a Town member with your ability, you will commit suicide at the end of the next night.
- When you die, all Town members gain Roleblock immunity.
- You're Roleblock and Redirect immune.
